hive

Class Bee

  • java.lang.Object
    • hive.Bee
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeehiveInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, SourceInterface

    public class Bee
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, SourceInterface, BeehiveInterface, java.io.Serializable
    The bee - lots of information is stored here. Each bee object is meant to be run as single thread, as there are lots of actions, interactions, decisions and death (not implemented yet).sdfcc
    Author:
    ole
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bee

        Bee(World world,
   Beehive ownHive)
        Constructor method. Add to waiting queue, as bee is born in beehive and has nothing to do.
        Parameters:
        world - world object of the bee.
        ownHive - beehive object of the bee.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Run method, go to switcher
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • switcher

        private void switcher()
        When status of bee is changed, we should always get back here. Depending on the status field of the bee, the next method to be run is chosen.

      • arrived

        private void arrived()
        Bee has knowledge and arrived at source -> Get food

        private void dance()
        bien is at home and gives other bees information about trach better quality -> longer dance bigger size of tracht -> longer dance less food in beehive -> longer dance (not implemented) far away -> shorter dance
